Title: MEF MVVM
Description: A simple Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) implementation using Silverlight 4 and the Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF).

Project Description
A simple Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) implementation using Silverlight 4 and the Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF).
